responses: If it is a life or death matter, please open a ticket.
If looking for support, check the guides and ask players in General first.
Admin only help with serious issues, seek help from other players.
Admin are currently busy, be patient.
Server may need an update, this is done on restarts as per the rules.
Admin are looking into to it, if it's a mod needing update it will be done on restart.
Technical issues please stand by.
There are 10000+ servers out there, go find one more suited to your needs.
Instead of complaining, trying being productive and finding something to make you happy.
That's an issue not an ishme
Go touch some grass.
This is not an airport, no need to announce your departure.
Okay, do you want a cookie?
Are you leaving the server, or is the server leaving you?
As you wish.
I suggest going to the trader, checking prices, then make your own decision.
There are plenty of activities out there, find one that suits you.
Go looting, see what you see.
